alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:48PM CDT until August 05 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mobile Regional Airport, or 6 miles west of Midtown Mobile, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, and Mobile Regional Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
